Student Financial Aid and Scholarships     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Financial Aid and Scholarships      Student Financial Aid and Scholarships   Main Menu    Cost           Cost of Attendance (COA)    Estimating EFC    Financial Need    Paying Your Bill         Financial Aid Steps           Illinois RISE Act    Eligibility    Apply    Verification    Financial Aid Notification    Payment    Summer Financial Aid    SAP Policy & Appeal    Special Circumstances    Rights & Responsibilities    Withdrawing vs. Reducing Hours    FERPA    Calendar         Types of Aid           Grants    Scholarships    Waivers & Assistantships    Loans    Student Employment    Study Abroad    Veterans    Pre-paid Tuition         Forms           2019-2020 Forms    2020-2021 Forms         FAQ           Glossary of Terms    Contact Us         Consumer Information           Academic Programs    Department of Education Complaint Process    Financial Aid Information    Semester Withdrawals    General Institutional Information    Health, Safety and Security    Intercollegiate Athletic Program Participation Rates and Financial Support Data    Student Outcomes    Voter Registration    Notice of Availability of Institutional and Financial Aid Information    Contact Information for Assistance in Obtaining Institutional or Financial Aid Information          Eyebrow menu    Scholarships    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Estimating EFC      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Student Financial Aid and Scholarships    Cost    Estimating EFC        Estimating EFC  The federal government expects students and families to contribute to the cost of college to the extent that they are able. After receiving a FAFSA the federal government determines a studentâ€™s Expected Family Contribution (EFC), which will be listed on the FAFSA completion page and the UIC financial aid notification.  Important Note: The EFC is NOT the sum that a student/family will pay to the university. Exact costs for attending UIC are determined after a complete review of financial aid materials.  Click here to get an estimate of your EFC.          Cost           Cost of Attendance (COA)    Estimating EFC    Financial Need    Paying Your Bill
